name: Book of Mormon Heroes
description: This app brings the characters of the Book of Mormon to life in a way you have never experienced before. Each card shows an amazingly realistic picture of the character, gives details about their life, and lists the scriptures where they can be found. If you get more than one of a card, then trade it with a friend! Once your collection is at legendary level, you can journey on a campaign to take on the villains of the Book of Mormon yourself!
